hints.content:
Each digit of $430{,}100$ is one place to the left of the same digit in the number $43{,}010$.

Hundred thousands | Ten thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: |:-: |:-:
$$ | $\greenD4$ | $\blueD3$  | $\purpleC0$ | $\maroonD1$  | $\tealD0$
$\greenD4$ | $\blueD3$ | $\purpleC0$  | $\maroonD1$  | $\tealD0$  | $\goldD0$

Moving each digit to the left means multiplying by $10$: 
  
$43{,}010\times 10=430{,}100$

question.content:
**Fill in the blank so the sentence accurately explains the relationship between $430{,}100$ and $43{,}010$.**


$430{,}100$ is [[â˜ƒ dropdown 1]] $43{,}010$.
